          We will use the contact details if there are any problems with your form and we need to contact you.

            Privacy policy

            The email address provided will be used to check and match existing records held by Scottish Enterprise and to send emails during the set up of your business account.


            The email address will be used as the user name for sign-in and to communicate with you about your business account. Your contact preferences for this email address can be set when signed into your business account.
